overview.en: COF is a traceable private chain built on CAM-based chain technology. It utilizes the unique and non-tamperable distributed ledger record feature of the blockchain to build a traceability cloud platform, and solve the enterprise's raw materials through the sub-chain of the landing project and the corresponding DAPP application. Sources of information, anti-counterfeiting, and precision marketing in procurement, production, warehousing, circulation, distribution, and terminal consumption.
overview.zh: COF 是通过基于 CAM 公链技术搭建的溯源私链，利用区块链的独特不可篡改的分布式账本记录特性，构建溯源云平台，通过落地项目的子链及对应 DAPP 应用来 解决企业在商品原料采购、生产、仓储、流转、分销、终端消费过程中的信息溯源、防伪验真、精准营销难题。
